text: "Lose Yourself" is a hip hop song by American rapper Eminem. Eminem won an Academy Award in 2003 and a Grammy in 2004 for "Lose Yourself". It was performed live at the 2022 Super Bowl in Los Angeles and has had over 5,000,000 downloads in the United States alone. It is from and about his movie "8 Mile." It is Eminem's second-biggest hit to date. ==References== Category:2002 songs Category:Eminem songs Category:Best Original Song Academy Award-winning songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs
title: Lose Yourself
